Raspberry Pi Camp

item.title: Minecraft Modding & Mobile Gaming Camp
item.description:
Minecraft Modding

Campers learned the ways of Minecraft Modding by learning core principles of programming. There are tons of languages used for programming. Campers modified and deployed code written in either Java or Python.

Enchanted bridges, exploding minecarts and anvils, coordinate trackers and working Minecraft clocks... These were just a …

Using GitHub Desktop
